entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:02 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 1:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 54 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
